description: This Java class, AccountService, provides methods for retrieving bank and utility account information from repositories and converting them into DTOs. It is a service layer component in a Spring application managing bank account entities.

classes.name: AccountService
classes.description: A Spring service class that provides methods to fetch account data and convert entities to DTOs.

methods.name: readBankAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a bank account by account number, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a utility account by provider name, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount
methods.description: Retrieves a utility account by ID, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.
